system.description: Finally at level 10, your relic’s power now shines a light that few can disregard. You learn the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.bqavvq6ju5ti8hr3]{Light} and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.tvtm60k5wxyki9qc]{Sacred Flame} cantrips and the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.k6hp55xktapsrjqo]{Divine Favor}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.wbbjargj0lf23adk]{Moonbeam}, and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.pbtje70pd17ouy83]{Spirit Guardians} spells as wielder spells. They do not count against your spells known.
